==== Introduction ====

Hello and welcome to the Wiki page of tuxxy.  Please enjoy your stay.

==== About Me ====

I am a computer systems graduate with a thirst for knowledge and technology.  Currently I run the Ubuntu-64-bit team and also moderate Ubuntu Brainstorm.  I am a very active member of the Ubuntu Forums and IRC providing help and advice on both.

==== Contributions to Ubuntu ====

Below is a list of my contributions to the Ubuntu community over the last year;

* tuxxy created the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/64BitTeam|Ubuntu-64-bit User-Group]]</nowiki>

* tuxxy is a <nowiki>[[http://brainstorm.ubuntu.com/contributor/tuxxy/|Brainstorm Moderator]]</nowiki> 

* Active member on the Ubuntu Forums since 2008 with over 2500 support posts and was invited to become a member of the Ubuntu Forums<nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/group.php?groupid=52|unanswered-posts team]]</nowiki>

* Test new software and Ubuntu releases including bug reporting 

* Active member of the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu-uk.org/|Ubuntu-UK LoCo Team]]</nowiki>
